EmailTemplate.name: RE: Bluewater Norman Davis MBO Agreement (1338833343.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Bluewater Norman Davis MBO Agreement (1338833343.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Emily, Hope you had a nice weekend I just wanted to follow up on the paperwork for Norman. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> Please let me know if I can help facilitate the paperwork. Thank you!Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 3:41 PM To: Emily White Cc: ndavis4@msn.com Subject: RE: Bluewater Norman Davis MBO Agreement Hi Emily, Sounds good. Once we have an executed contract I will ask our broker to provide you with a COI listing Bluewater as holder on our policy. In the mean time I have attached a sample certificate so you can see that we will be able to meet the requirements below. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Emily White [mailto:emily.white@BlueH2Ogroup.com] <mailto:[mailto:emily.white@BlueH2Ogroup.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 3:20 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com> Subject: RE: Bluewater Norman Davis MBO Agreement Thanks very much, Sara. As discussed, here are the insurance requirements for BlueWater contractors: Insurance for Individual (1099, not CTC) $250,000 General Liability Insurance including Contractual Liability and Broad Form Property Damage Liability. BWCG needs to be listed as additional insurance$250,000 Automotive Liability Insurance coverage for all owned, non-owned and hired automobiles with a minimum combined single limit of $250,000 per occurrence for bodily injury and property damage. BWCG needs to be listed as additionally insured Insurance for Corporation (CTC, not 1099) Worker's Compensation - $1,000,000 per occurrence General Liability - Comprehensive General Liability Insurance including Contractual Liability and Broad Form Property Damage Liability coverage for damages to any property with a minimum combined single limited of $1,000,000.00 per occurrence. This policy will be endorsed to name BWCG as a additional insured Automotive - Automotive Liability Insurance coverage for all owned, non-owned and hired automobiles with a minimum combined single limit of $1,000,000 per occurrence for bodily injury and property damage. BWCG needs to be listed as additionally insured Umbrella Liability with a minimum limit of $4,000,000.00 Professional Indemnity - Covering errors, acts of omissions not less than $1,000,000.00 per loss The address that should be on the COI is the following:BlueWater Communications Group, LLC110 Parkway Drive SouthHauppauge, NY 11788 If you have any questions or concerns, let me know! Thanks again. Best, Emily Emily White Lead Technical Recruiter O. 212.324.4327 M. 917.748.7286 emily.white@BlueH2OGroup.com <mailto:%20emily.white@blueh2ogroup.com>BlueWater, A Presidio Company 1 Penn Plaza, Suite 1614 New York, NY 10119 www.BlueH2OGroup.com <http://www.blueh2ogroup.com/> From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 29, 2012 3:12 PM To: Emily White Cc: ndavis4@msn.com <mailto:ndavis4@msn.com> Subject: Bluewater Norman Davis MBO Agreement Importance: High Dear Emily , My name is Sara and I am a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me by Norman Davis. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners caters to two markets. Our first service is designed for independent consultants and small businsses <http://www.mbopartners.com/#howwehelp> who choose to plug into our MBO Services Cloud to make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so they can stay focused on delivering on their services. The second is how we help enterprise organizations engage more efficently and safely with their contract workforce <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf> and statement of work <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me. And, please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions. Thanks again, and I look forward to working with you. Best regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
